LanguageData.Alien_Ood.label: Ood
LanguageData.Alien_Ood.description: The Ood, also known as Oodkind, are a gestalt species of telepathic humanoids native to the Ood Sphere. Humanity has enslaved the Ood, mutilating them to ensure a dedication to servitude.
LanguageData.Alien_Ood.tools.0.label: left fist
LanguageData.Alien_Ood.tools.1.label: right fist
